titles.title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on Reactive Red 238.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: 5/9/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on Reactive Red 238.
